languages.text: "Я не читаю вам мораль, {name}. Я хочу убедиться, что вам понятно, с чем вы играете, и ваши решения не продиктованы блажью".

traits.locale_text: "Я не читаю вам мораль, {name}. Я хочу убедиться, что вам понятно, с чем вы играете, и ваши решения не продиктованы игривой блажью".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "I am not lecturing you, {name}. I want to ensure that you understand what you are trifling with, and that you are not making decisions on a whim."
languages.original_text: "Я не читаю вам мораль, {name}. Я хочу убедиться, что вам понятно, с чем вы играете, и ваши решения не продиктованы блажью".

traits.locale_text: "I am not lecturing you, {name}. I want to ensure that you understand what you are trifling with, and that you are not making decisions on a whim."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am not lecturing you, {name}. I want to ensure that you understand what you are trifling with, and that you are not making decisions on a whim."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am not lecturing you, {name}. I want to ensure that you understand what you are trifling with, and that you are not making decisions on a whim."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am not lecturing you, {name}. I want to ensure that you understand what you are trifling with, and that you are not making decisions on a whim."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我并不是在说教，{name}。我只是希望你能明白，你草率对待的事情有多么重要。希望你能明白，不要因为一时心血来潮而做决定。”
languages.original_text: "I am not lecturing you, {name}. I want to ensure that you understand what you are trifling with, and that you are not making decisions on a whim."

traits.locale_text: “我并不是在说教，{name}。我只是希望你能明白，你草率对待的事情有多么重要。希望你能明白，不要因为一时心血来潮而做决定。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «No le estoy sermoneando, {name}. Solo quiero asegurarme de que entiende con qué está tratando y que sus decisiones no se deben a un simple capricho».
languages.original_text: "I am not lecturing you, {name}. I want to ensure that you understand what you are trifling with, and that you are not making decisions on a whim."

traits.locale_text: «No le estoy sermoneando, {name}. Solo quiero asegurarme de que entiende con qué está tratando y que sus decisiones no se deben a un simple capricho».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「説教をしているのではない、{name}。あなたが些細なことで、気まぐれに決断をくだすべきではないことを理解してもらいたいのだ」
languages.original_text: "I am not lecturing you, {name}. I want to ensure that you understand what you are trifling with, and that you are not making decisions on a whim."

traits.locale_text: 「説教をしているのではない、{name}。あなたが些細なことで、気まぐれに決断をくだすべきではないことを理解してもらいたいのだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne vous fais pas la leçon, {name}. Je veux simplement m'assurer que vous avez conscience de ce que vous faites et que vous n'avez pas pris cette décision sur un coup de tête. »
languages.original_text: "I am not lecturing you, {name}. I want to ensure that you understand what you are trifling with, and that you are not making decisions on a whim."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne vous fais pas la leçon, {name}. Je veux simplement m'assurer que vous avez conscience de ce que vous faites et que vous n'avez pas pris cette décision sur un coup de tête. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich halte Euch keinen Vortrag, {name}. Ich möchte nur, dass Euch klar wird, womit Ihr da leichtfertig umgeht, und dass Ihr Eure Entscheidungen nicht aus einer Laune heraus trefft."
languages.original_text: "I am not lecturing you, {name}. I want to ensure that you understand what you are trifling with, and that you are not making decisions on a whim."

traits.locale_text: "Ich halte Euch keinen Vortrag, {name}. Ich möchte nur, dass Euch klar wird, womit Ihr da leichtfertig umgeht, und dass Ihr Eure Entscheidungen nicht aus einer Laune heraus trefft."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Sana nutuk çekmiyorum {name}. Kimlerle uğraştığını anladığından ve fevri karar vermediğinden emin olmak istiyorum."
languages.original_text: "I am not lecturing you, {name}. I want to ensure that you understand what you are trifling with, and that you are not making decisions on a whim."
